title: Marker Signage Price Font
content:
Not much to go on, but I'm looking to match this marker/script font. Any ideas?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023071144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/25_4225.jpg)

Font: 

 Harabara Hand
author: MMP Winnipeg

comments.content:
Nevermind! :)

Found it while looking for a good alternative.
